subject: [Radiance-general] Workshop Day 1
body:
Hi Shamim,

I never did get Ladan's slides, but I will get them soon and I'll send you a copy, as I think Andy's on vacation at the moment.

Eventually they'll all be on the radiance-online site, and the recordings too.
